ygData.subject: RE: Small Tattered Cloak.  Anyone found it yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: When the cloaks hit the servers I had a friend of mine make me some small ones. They all come across as Small Patchwork Cloak, the belts come across as Small
ygData.messageBody:
When the cloaks hit the servers I had a friend of mine make me
some small ones. They all come across as Small Patchwork
Cloak, the belts come across as Small Tattered belt.
I think so far the only way to get a Tattered cloak is through the
newbie quests and the items given for that are random. I personally
have done the Red V one over 20 times and have yet to get one,
but now I have one Bull Smasher and really good faction with the
guards. :)



From: "Battlestaff Fuzzietoe" <andrie@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date sent: Fri, 29 Oct 1999 16:57:15 -0500
Send reply to: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Small Tattered Cloak. Anyone found it yet?

> From: "Battlestaff Fuzzietoe" <andrie@...>
>
> Well the Cloaks only hit Live Servers like 2 or 3 Patches Back. I do
> believe ALL patchwork is called Tattered.
>

> Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Small Tattered Cloak. Anyone found it yet?

> When I was messing around with tailoring (many levels ago)
> I was making only patchwork. I seem to recall that when you
> put patchwork on it was mysteriously called "tattered." Now
> I don't seem to recall ever being able to make a cloak,
> but then again, I haven't don't tailoring in months.
>
> Shahk Sinnoyade - Seeker of Lore
